settings.question_faqs_1: What is the cost for shipping?
settings.answer_faqs_1: Free shipping is available for any order with an order value over $60 and a shipping address located within Canada. Please see below for shipping options for orders being sent to the USA and other International locations.
settings.question_faqs_2: What are my options for shipping within Canada?
settings.answer_faqs_2: We use Canada Post to ship within Canada, click here for the details. For holiday shipping deadlines, click here.
settings.question_faqs_3: Do you ship outside of Canada?
settings.answer_faqs_3: Yes, you can select to ship to locations outside of Canada via Canada Post. Please allow additional time for shipping to locations outside of Canada.
settings.question_faqs_4: I want to ship my order to a rural address in Canada and I’m concerned that it may not be delivered. What are my options?
settings.answer_faqs_4: In order to ensure delivery of your order please confirm your full mailing address with correct postal code using the search option available on the Canada Post website.
settings.question_faqs_5: I entered the wrong address when I completed the shipping information, what should I do?
settings.answer_faqs_5: If you realize that you entered an incorrect shipping address for your order, respond to the confirmation email you received when you processed your order. Responding immediately is imperative as orders are being sent out on a daily basis. If Earth Rangers is not notified of the mistake before the item is shipped Earth Rangers will not refund or replace the order or pay for re-shipping.

settings.question_faqs_1: What is the cost for shipping?
settings.answer_faqs_1: The cost for shipping depends on the service you chose and where the order is being shipped to. The cost of shipping will be calculated for you upon check out.
settings.question_faqs_2: Can I pick up my order to avoid shipping costs?
settings.answer_faqs_2: Unfortunately Earth Rangers is not set up to have orders picked up from our offices.
settings.answer_faqs_3: Yes, you can track your delivery through Canada Post. You will need the tracking number that was emailed to you after you placed your order.

settings.question_faqs_1: Can I turn on/off Item Animation / Effect if item on theme?
settings.answer_faqs_1: Yes, we do. Please send your customisation requests to email@domain.com, we will give you our quote. Thank you.
settings.question_faqs_2: Can I turn on/off Item Animation / Effect if item on theme?
settings.answer_faqs_2:
Please make sure that you follow below steps:

1/ Download the package from themeforest.net (The file is in zip format)

2/ Extract the file you've just downloaded (Don't forget this step).

3/ Find this file: ella-x.x.x-sections-ready.zip in the folder Ella Sections Ready x.x.x, then you just need to upload ella-x.x.x-sections-ready.zip file to your Shopify store.

- If you would like to use Ella RTL version. Please find this file: ella-x.x.x-sections-ready-rtl.zip in the folder Ella Sections Ready x.x.x RTL, then you just need to upload ella-x.x.x-sections-ready-rtl.zip file to your Shopify store

- If you want to install child theme, please go to the corresponding theme folder
settings.question_faqs_3: Can I turn on/off some blocks on the page?
settings.answer_faqs_3: Yes. You can turn on/off almost any blocks on the page (featured products, slideshow, banners, related products, recent products,...).
settings.question_faqs_4: I want to have the dropdown cart displayed automatically every time clients hover over it (instead of clicking on it). Is it possible?
settings.answer_faqs_4: Yes, we have a setting for you to switch between these two options: Display on Hover and Display on Click.
settings.question_faqs_5: What is included in the theme package?
settings.answer_faqs_5: The theme package includes Theme source, Photoshop design files and manual guide.

settings.question_faqs_1: I notice that the images used in the theme are all portrait. Will that be a problem if I use square images for our products? How will they be displayed in the theme?
settings.answer_faqs_1: That is not a problem. You just need to modify the width/height ratio in theme settings.
